reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust Regions Regulation

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Act means the Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust Act;
electoral area has the same meaning as in the Local Government Act.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of the Act:

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Columbia-Kootenay region means that area of British Columbia comprising the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the Regional District of Kootenay Boundary;
the Regional District of Central Kootenay;
in the Columbia-Shuswap Regional District, electoral areas A and B, the City of Revelstoke and the Town of Golden;

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Thompson-Okanagan region means that area of British Columbia comprising the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in the Thompson-Nicola Regional District, electoral areas A, B, J, L, M, N, O and P, the City of Kamloops, the City of Merritt and the Village of Chase;
in the Fraser Valley Regional District, electoral areas A and B and the District of Hope;
the Regional District of Central Okanagan;
the Regional District of North Okanagan;
in the Columbia Shuswap Regional District, electoral areas C, D, E and F, the City of Salmon Arm and the District of Sicamous.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust Act, S.B.C. 2005, c. 39, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sections 1 and 25]
